metadata.title: CVE-2016-4383 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The glance-manage db in all versions of HPE Helion Openstack Glance allowsdeleted image ids to be reassigned, which allows remote authenticated usersto cause other users to boot into a modified image without notification ofthe change.

criterions.comment: glance: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
